defines.label: average
defines.comment: An average of observations made over the given time window.

defines.label: count
defines.comment: The total count over the given time window.

defines.label: instant
defines.comment: An instantaneous observation recorded at single point in time.

defines.label: maximum
defines.comment: The maximum value observed over the given time window.

defines.label: minimum
defines.comment: The minimum value observed over the given time window.

defines.label: sum
defines.comment: The sum of values observed over the given time window.
